title: Designing Mathematics Pedagogy to Improve Online Learning Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Advanced mathematics course for working professionals, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments. Digital devices are provided, but internet access and technical proficiency may vary among learners.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain math problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through real-time interactions in an online environment.
Learners will perform collaborative project work with peers at least three times using digital collaboration tools and submit final deliverables.
Learners will propose and implement strategies to improve online learning satisfaction by over 30% through surveys and feedback sessions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
